PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-06252023-06-22JUS
ActTax Court of Canada Act
PrecisReappointment of the HONOURABLE HENRY A. VISSER, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Tax Court of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of the HONOURABLE HENRY A. VISSER, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Tax Court of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
